documentType: bureau of prisons count sheet and inmate roster
summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 10, 2019. It includes an out-count sheet, an inmate roster, and multiple official count slips, recording inmate population counts and assignments. The roster lists four inmates, all designated as being in a 'SUICIDE R' (suicide risk) status.

persons.name: Bullock
persons.context: Listed as an inmate on the MCC roster with registration number 86409-054, assigned to the hospital and designated as a suicide risk.

persons.name: Santana
persons.context: Listed as an inmate on the MCC roster with registration number 48816-066, designated as a suicide risk.

persons.name: Walker
persons.context: Listed as an inmate on the MCC roster with registration number 86900-054, designated as a suicide risk.

persons.name: Woglaston
persons.context: Listed as an inmate on the MCC roster with registration number 85369-054, designated as a suicide risk.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine administrative count of the inmate population at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, recording a total of 758 inmates.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated August 10, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein was found deceased in his cell at MCC New York.
An inmate roster lists four inmates (Bullock, Santana, Walker, Woglaston) all with a 'SUICIDE R' (suicide risk) assignment status.
The total inmate count recorded for the facility on this date was 758 individuals.
The documents are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative forms for tracking inmate population and location.
The forms include out-count sheets and official count slips, which are part of standard prison operational procedures.
